---
name: "Feature request"
about: "Suggest an idea for this project"
title: "[FEATURE] "
labels: ["enhancement"]
assignees: []
---

## Summary
A clear and concise description of what the problem or opportunity is.

## Proposed solution
Describe the proposed solution in enough detail for maintainers to evaluate and implement. Include examples, API sketches, or mockups if relevant.

## Why is this needed?
Explain the user/persona and pain this solves, and why current behavior is insufficient.

## Alternatives considered
List any alternative solutions or workarounds you considered.

## Acceptance criteria
Clear, testable criteria that indicate when the feature is complete.

## UI/UX
If applicable, include screenshots, mockups, or links to designs.

## Backwards compatibility / Migration
Note any data migrations, config changes, or breaking changes required.

## Additional context
Add any other context, links, or references.
